title: 整合包崩溃
author: Silence-WJS
txt_content:
用的最新版的HMCL启动器  下面是日志报告---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  EnderCorePlugin (EnderCore-1.12.2-0.5.41.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (InventoryTweaks-1.64-dev.jar)
  CorePlugin (SmoothFont-1.12.2-1.16.jar)
  AppleCore (AppleCore-mc1.12.2-3.1.4.jar)
  JechCore (JustEnoughCharacters-1.12.0-3.1.0.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 10/8/18 5:19 PM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from Thaumcraft (thaumcraft)

**图片_20181008171318.png
(165.56 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2018-10-8 17:15 上传

每次运行到这里就崩溃

replies.author: Zep6174
replies.txt_content:
你去看看论坛内神秘时代6的搬运贴，有人反馈了。

Thaumcraft-1.12.2-6.1.BETA25  不支持  1.12.2-Forge 14.23.5.2768。

1.12.2-Forge 14.23.4.2767  也是不行。

你要退到  1.12.2-Forge 14.23.4.2766  才能玩。

或者等待作者更新。。。就这些。
